Content: *p67822a0824*8(b)the student added masses to the trolley.  he measured the total mass m of the trolley and masses.  he recorded the following values of the time period t for each value of m.m/kgt/s0.8000.781.3001.011.8001.182.3001.342.8001.493.3001.60(i) plot a graph of log t against log m on the grid opposite.  use the additional columns in the table to record your processed data.(6)(ii) the student predicts that the relationship between t and m is given by2mtk=where k is the spring constant.discuss the validity of this prediction.(5)
